mapper.insert: insert into CBMDB.WELL_DATA_HIS (ID, PLC_IPADDR, WELL_ID, WELL_NAME, WELL_NUM, AREA_ID, AREA_NAME, U_A, U_B, U_C, I_A, I_B, I_C, E_P, E_Q, E_COS, E_E, E_FREQ, E_DAY, WELL_STROKE, WELL_FREQ, PRESS_CASE, PRESS_PIPE, PRESS_DOWNHOLE, TEMP_DOWNHOLE, LENGTH_DOWNHOLE, FLOW_GAS_INSTANT, FLOW_GAS_TOTLE, FLOW_GAS_PRESS, FLOW_GAS_TEMP, FLOW_GAS_TOTLE0, FLOW_GAS_TOTLE0_TIME, FLOW_GAS_DAY, FLOW_WATER_INSTANT, FLOW_WATER_TOTLE, FLOW_WATER_TOTLE0, FLOW_WATER_TOTLE0_TIME, FLOW_WATER_DAY, VFD_RUN_MODE, VFD_RUN_MODE_INFO, VFD_CTRL_MODE, VFD_CTRL_MODE_INFO, VFD_FREQ_CONF, VFD_FREQ_RUN, VFD_FREQ_ERR, VFD_OUT_I, VFD_OUT_TORQUE, AUTO_MODE, AUTO_MODE_INFO, AUTO_DOWN_LEN, DEVICE_MODE, DEVICE_MODE_INFO, DEVICE_STAT, DEVICE_STAT_INFO, GT_ID, GT_BASE_ID, I_UPPER, I_LOWER, LOAD_UPPER, LOAD_LOWER, TIME_MARK, REMARK, MARK, STIME, ETIME, FLOW_WATER_P_TOTLE, FLOW_WATER_R_TOTLE, GAS_CONFIG, GAS_VALUE, GT_TIME, LOAD_MAX, LOAD_MIN ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{plcIpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wellId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wellNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uA,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uB,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uC,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iA,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iB,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iC,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eP,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eQ,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eCos,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eFreq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wellStroke,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wellFreq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pressCase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pressPipe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pressDownhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tempDownhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lengthDownhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowGasInstant,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowGasTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowGasPress,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowGasTemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowGasTotle0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowGasTotle0Time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flowGasDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowWaterInstant,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowWaterTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowWaterTotle0,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowWaterTotle0Time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flowWaterDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdRunMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdRunModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vfdCtrlMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdCtrlModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vfdFreqConf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdFreqRun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdFreqErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdOutI,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vfdOutTorque,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{autoMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{autoModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autoDownLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deviceMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deviceModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceStat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deviceStatInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gtId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gtBaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iUpper,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loadUpper,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loadLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flowWaterPTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowWaterRTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gasConfig,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gasValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loadMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loadMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

insert into CBMDB.WELL_DATA_HIS
ID,
PLC_IPADDR,
WELL_ID,
WELL_NAME,
WELL_NUM,
AREA_ID,
AREA_NAME,
U_A,
U_B,
U_C,
I_A,
I_B,
I_C,
E_P,
E_Q,
E_COS,
E_E,
E_FREQ,

WELL_FREQ,
PRESS_CASE,

PRESS_DOWNHOLE,

FLOW_GAS_INSTANT,
FLOW_GAS_TOTLE,

FLOW_GAS_TEMP,
FLOW_GAS_TOTLE0,
FLOW_GAS_TOTLE0_TIME,
FLOW_GAS_DAY,
FLOW_WATER_INSTANT,
FLOW_WATER_TOTLE,
FLOW_WATER_TOTLE0,
FLOW_WATER_TOTLE0_TIME,
FLOW_WATER_DAY,
VFD_RUN_MODE,
VFD_RUN_MODE_INFO,
VFD_CTRL_MODE,
VFD_CTRL_MODE_INFO,
VFD_FREQ_CONF,
VFD_FREQ_RUN,
VFD_FREQ_ERR,
VFD_OUT_I,
VFD_OUT_TORQUE,
AUTO_MODE,
AUTO_MODE_INFO,

MARK,

GAS_VALUE,
GT_TIME,
LOAD_MAX,
LOAD_MIN,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{plcIpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wellId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wellNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uA,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{uB,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{uC,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{iA,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{iB,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{iC,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{eP,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{eQ,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{eCos,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{eE,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{eFreq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{eDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wellStroke,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wellFreq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pressCase,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pressPipe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pressDownhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{tempDownhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lengthDownhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{flowGasTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowGasPress,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowGasTemp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowGasTotle0,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowGasTotle0Time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flowGasDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowWaterInstant,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowWaterTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowWaterTotle0,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowWaterTotle0Time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flowWaterDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdRunMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdRunModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vfdCtrlMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdCtrlModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vfdFreqConf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdFreqRun,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdFreqErr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdOutI,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vfdOutTorque,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{autoMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{autoModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{autoDownLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{deviceMode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{deviceModeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceStat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{deviceStatInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gtId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{gtBaseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{iUpper,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{iLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{loadUpper,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{loadLower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{timeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mark,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{flowWaterPTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{flowWaterRTotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{gasConfig,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{gasValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{gtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{loadMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{loadMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select:
select * from WELL_DATA_HIS WHERE 1=1 and well_id in (select id from well_info where AUTOMATION_MARK=0 and mark=0)
and stime >= to_date(#{timeStart}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi')
and stime <= to_date(#{timeEnd}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi')
and WELL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{wellName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY id DESC

select * from WELL_DATA_HIS where Well_ID = #{wellId} and well_id in (select id from well_info where AUTOMATION_MARK=0 and mark=0)
and etime >= to_date(#{timeStart}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and etime <= to_date(#{timeEnd}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY STIME DESC

select * from WELL_DATA_HIS -- well_id,well_name,stime,vfd_freq_run,FLOW_GAS_PRESS,PRESS_CASE,FLOW_GAS_INSTANT,FLOW_GAS_TOTLE,press_Downhole where Well_ID = #{wellId} and well_id in (select id from well_info where AUTOMATION_MARK=0 and mark=0)
and etime >= to_date(#{timeStart}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and etime <= to_date(#{timeEnd}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY STIME
